org.eclipse.mcp.experimental.annotated
 
org.eclipse.mcp.factory
 
  • Classes in org.eclipse.mcp.factory used by org.eclipse.mcp.experimental.annotated
    Class
    Description
    IFactory
    Interface for components contributing MCP functionality
    IResourceTemplateFactory
    Interface for contributing MCP Resource Templates containing uri's with substitution variables and support for completion assistance of variable values
    ToolFactory
    Factory for contributing a single MCP tool See MCPAnnotatedToolFactory for a convenience way to create multiple tools in a file using annotations

    Class
    Description
    IFactory
    Interface for components contributing MCP functionality
    IResourceFactory
    Interface for components that may dynamically add and remove MCP resources to the server
    IResourceTemplateFactory
    Interface for contributing MCP Resource Templates containing uri's with substitution variables and support for completion assistance of variable values

    Factory for contributing a single MCP tool See MCPAnnotatedToolFactory for a convenience way to create multiple tools in a file using annotations
